basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Integration-Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Experienced Full Stack Developer with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics and over 3 years of experience in designing, building, and maintaining integration solutions that link various applications and platforms. Proficient in front-end technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript frameworks like Vue.js and React.js, and back-end development with Node.js, Python, Express.js, and MongoDB for API development and web services. Passionate about collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement system integrations, resolve integration issues, and deliver high-performance full-stack web applications in fast-paced environments.

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design, build, and maintain full-stack integration solutions using Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and TypeScript for the AdsMedia retargeting platform.
highlights: Architected and developed key dashboard and form components for campaign management, ensuring seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems
Implemented responsive design with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to deliver cohesive user experiences across devices
Integrated APIs to enable smooth data flow and high-performance application functionality

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Developed full-stack web applications and integration solutions, including API development with OpenAI APIs and web services, while collaborating with cross-functional teams in Agile environments.
highlights: Led frontend development and refactoring of an exam management platform using Vue.js, Vuetify, HTML, and CSS, improving user experience and performance by 25%
Engineered AI-powered browser extension (AdCognition) with TypeScript and TensorFlow.js for real-time ad detection, integrating machine learning models into web applications
Developed RoboGPT extension using Python, Node.js, and OpenAI APIs to integrate natural language processing for robot control, demonstrating expertise in system integrations and web services

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Developed automation tools to integrate processes and improve efficiency in customer support operations.
highlights: Designed and implemented Otis, a JavaScript-based tool using RegEx for automating form-filling and email generation, resolving integration issues and enhancing team productivity
Collaborated with teams to identify requirements and proactively address workflow challenges in a fast-paced environment

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based automation tool that integrated processes to improve efficiency in customer support

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: Full-stack web application built with MERN stack for end-to-end development and integration of user features.
highlights: Designed dynamic frontend features using React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for cohesive user experience
Developed backend with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, including API development for seamless data integration

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: Nvidia Isaac Sim extension integrating LLMs and OpenAI APIs for natural language control of robots.

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: AI-powered browser extension integrating TensorFlow.js for real-time ad detection and blocking.
